page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content: {CHELFORD}Church is the only Church England Church in our area. It is called Saint John the Evangelist Church. It is run by Reverend John Ellis who has been vicar there for four years. There has been a Church in {CHELFORD}since the 13th century. It has just celebrated the centenary of the bells. Specially for the celebrations they had handbell ringers to accompany some of the hymns. There was the full three hour peal of bells on the 17th June 1985 to celebrate the anniversary. Every month the Guides and Brownies parade in the Church, joining in the service. There is a Church choir of 19 people. Inside, the church is brightly decorated. The balcony has been made into a church hall used for meetings and serving coffee after the service and as a Sunday school room.
